tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I booked a session at 12.40 P.M with the doctor, for fast and irregular heart rhythm, which he had to postpone to 5.10 P.M due to some emergency surgery he had to take care of. But, he personally called me and explained why he had to do that and asked me if I was okay with the new timing. Once I visited I had to wait for just 10-15 mins. Once he examined me he suggested ECG and Echo after checking which he told my heart was perfectly alright and the change in the pace of heart was probably just stress. He gave some tablet to bring down the heart rate. Now I'm feeling good. I would recommend this doctor.

-Sathwik
reply_text: Thanks for understanding satvik. Have a great day ahead

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Very friendly doctor.  Helpful nature, what's important is he listens to the issue patiently. Does not seem to be in a hurry to instruct variety of test. Suggests only required tests. Explains issue well. 
We had good experience. 
- Pradnya Shashank

tags: Wait time,
review: Went to the Clinic but did not consult the doctor. The doctor went out for rounds in some other hospital though we had appointment. That can be accepted as doctors do need to go for rounds. However the main reason why we left the place was the attitude of the receptionist. The receptionist was rude with not only us but even other patients and was making signs and remarks which is not acceptable. No one is visiting the clinic free of cost. Get a well behaved receptionist first

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
** ***** ** *** **** ****** ** ********** He is so friendly and explains each point in detail. Takes care of patient as his family member. Ensure all tests are done within time.
He should be role model for todays generation doctors. 
He is gem and really an exception in todays hospital world. 
Thanks Dr Ashwin Sir
Regards 
Raghvendra M Kamat

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I had gone for chest pain. Dr Ashwin listened to my problem in detail nd then only prescribed the needed tests. He explained me why we do these test. My test results for ECG, 2D nd TMT were normal. He personally looks into yr issue nd no unwanted charges were taken.

Was relaxed after he assured that everything is fine, no medication was prescribed.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: Went for a second opinion. And doctors explanation and diagnosis was to the point and exact. He even consoled saying that the hole is not a big issue, which I didn't get in my first opinion. And he spends ample time for each consultation. Thanks doctor. Go to doctor for cardiac problems.
Doctor is good and he listen very patiently . He is having good experience and has all the test test machine available at his clinic. He talks about how to be healthy and what not to do.
reply_text: Thanks for your appreciation.  Wishing you good health always.
